item.title: Critic’s Notebook: The Awful Optics of CBS Canceling ‘The Late Show With Stephen Colbert’
item.description: Does the end of Colbert’s show in May 2026 relate to the Paramount-Skydance merger? To Colbert’s criticism of Donald Trump? To the demise of late night television? Who’s to say?

item.title: Critic’s Notebook: The Awful Optics of CBS Canceling ‘The Late Show With Stephen Colbert’
item.description: Does the end of Colbert’s show in May 2026 relate to the Paramount-Skydance merger? To Colbert’s criticism of Donald Trump? To the demise of late night television? Who’s to say?

item.title: ‘Untamed’ Review: Eric Bana and Lily Santiago Anchor Netflix’s Intriguing but Rushed Yosemite-Set Mystery
item.description: Co-created by ‘American Primeval’ scribe Mark L. Smith, this six-episode thriller traces a murder investigation in the famous national park.

item.title: ‘Dexter: Resurrection’ Should’ve Let the Dead Rest: TV Review
item.description: There’s a morbid symmetry to how the “Dexter” franchise limps along as its parent company, too, becomes a shell of its former self. Showtime, once a premium cable competitor to HBO, now lives on large
